products.description: C-3PO is a droid programmed for etiquette and protocol, built by the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker.
products.name: C-3PO

products.description: During his long life Chewbacca has been many things: Wookiee warrior, ace smuggler and rebel hero.
products.name: chewbacca

products.description: Once a Jedi Knight, Darth Vader was seduced by the dark side of the Force, and became a Sith Lord.
products.name: Darth Vader

products.description: Forever captain of the Millennium Falcon, and Princess Leia Organa's crush.
products.name: Han Solo

products.description: Tatooine farmboy who become one of the greatest Jedi the galaxy has ever known.
products.name: Luke Skywalker

products.description: A resourceful astromech droid, and skilled starship mechanic and fighter pilot's assistant.
products.name: R2-D2

products.description: Elite shock troops who wield blaster rifles and pistols, but can't kill an elephant in front of their own eyes.
products.name: Stormtrooper

products.description: Yoda was a legendary Jedi Master and stronger than most in his connection with the Force.
products.name: Yoda
